basic_info.description: Hi there! My name is Sarah Mahdi and I have a background in the healthcare field and before that I served in the military as a linguist. While I enjoyed my previous job in the pharmaceutical industry, I found my passion in building things.The versatility and potential of software development are truly phenomenal, and I want to be part of it. I am amazed and fascinated by how technology is evolving and always have been since I was in 8th grade.One of my strongest skills is researching to find the best solution to a problem, which this has been a big part of my previous two jobs

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This is the big first project I got to learn how to build a table to display the hourly sale for multiple store locations along with displaying the amount of cookies sold daily across all locations. Also, I got to display the store locations all over all the world and what the store offers. This was my first time learning how to build a two pages website

projects.title: MilkshakesRUs
projects.description: This project was our final project for 201, where the customer can customize their own milkshakes after answering 4 questions. The recommended product will be displayed along with calories and price. We used Modal for this milkshakes website and it was a fun project overall

projects.title: Gallery Of Horns
projects.description: This was my first project using React. It's about different animals who have many horns that can range from zero to one hundred. I used cards to display each beast and a favorite button plus I created a form that can sort them by horns.
